name: linter-eslint
description: Lint JavaScript on the fly, using ESLint

lintHtmlFiles.title: Lint HTML Files
lintHtmlFiles.description: You should also add `eslint-plugin-html` to your .eslintrc plugins

useGlobalEslint.title: Use global ESLint installation
useGlobalEslint.description: Make sure you have it in your $PATH

disableWhenNoEslintConfig.title: Disable when no ESLint config is found (in package.json or .eslintrc)

eslintrcPath.title: .eslintrc Path
eslintrcPath.description: It will only be used when there's no config file in project

globalNodePath.title: Global Node Installation Path
globalNodePath.description: Write the value of `npm get prefix` here

eslintRulesDir.title: ESLint Rules Dir
eslintRulesDir.description: Specify a directory for ESLint to load rules from

disableFSCache.title: Disable FileSystem Cache
disableFSCache.description: Paths of node_modules, .eslintignore and others are cached

fixOnSave.title: Fix errors on save
fixOnSave.description: Have eslint attempt to fix some errors automatically when saving the file.

scopes.title: List of scopes to run ESLint on, run `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.
